dcterms:description: The Wall Street Journal dataset (WSJ0 and WSJ1) consists of about 80 hours of read speech and about 20,000 unique words, suitable for studying rich long-term dependency.
dcterms:title: Wall Street Journal (WSJ0 and WSJ1)
